text: Ezɨ Devit a ikaragha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ ti guizɨn gumazim, o? Israelian gumazir manam, nɨn mɨn gari? Bar puvatɨ. Nɨ bar me gafira. Nɨ tizim bagha deraghavɨra uan gumazir ekiam, a geghuvir puvatɨ? A nɨn atrivim, nɨ ti fozir puvatɨ, a? Gumazir mam, datɨrɨghɨra atrivim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa ian danganimɨn aven magh ghu.
